item.title: Creating Your Custom Jupyter Kernel from a Virtual Environment
item.description: Creating a Python Kernel Admin Prerequisite Admin must enable conda for all users by creating a symlink. This will let users create their own virtual environment by using the conda create command. 1 ln -s /opt/conda/bin/conda /usr/local/bin/conda User Instructions Python Users can launch a terminal session with either JupyterHub or SSH connections.
